title: McLennan County Sheriff's Department   Michelle Stough

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Employment history, all write ups, all complaints against conduct of Michelle Stough, day of hiring, day of exit. History including any family members employed by MCSO.
I sent a request to HR and they referred me back to you. 
B

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

title: McLennan County Administrator Justin Chapman      Feb. 6 and 7

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Case 21-175-C2 Sherre Whitney Johnston,  waiver of appeal, order to withdraw, judgment, disclosure of plea recommendation, judgment, order to correct defendant's name. These are not online and I am requesting them.

Case 2021-562-C1   Sherre Whitney Johnston,  JNS guilty plea no jury conviction by court, Disclosure of Plea recommendation, and all other files.

Case 2022-706-C2  Sherre Whitney Johnston, States conditional waiver of counts or paragraphs as part of a negotiated plea. Order on States waiver of counts or paragraphs as part of a negotiated plea

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
